label: B0
description: Absence of significant blood involvement; 5% or less of peripheral blood lymphocytes are atypical (Sezary) cells; Clone unknown; Stated as B0

label: B0a
description: Absence of significant blood involvement; 5% or less of peripheral blood lymphocytes are atypical (Sezary) cells; Clone negative; Stated as B0a

label: B0b
description: Absence of significant blood involvement:; 5% or less of peripheral blood lymphocytes are atypical (Sezary) cells; Clone positive; Stated as B0b

label: B1
description: Low blood tumor burden; More than 5% of peripheral blood lymphocytes are atypical (Sezary) cells but does not meet the criteria of B2; Clone unknown; Stated as B1

label: B1a
description: Low blood tumor burden; More than 5% of peripheral blood lymphocytes are atypical (Sezary) cells but does not meet the criteria of B2; Clone negative; Stated as B1a

label: B1b
description: Low blood tumor burden; More than 5% of peripheral blood lymphocytes are atypical (Sezary) cells but does not meet the criteria of B2; Clone positive; Stated as B1b

label: B2
description: High blood tumor burden; Greater than or equal to 1000 Sezary cells per microliter (uL); Clone positive; Stated as B2

label: test ordered, results unknown
description: Test ordered, results not in chart

label: unknown
description: Not documented in medical record; Peripheral Blood Involvement not assessed or unknown if assessed
